abstract: Mauro Germán Camoranesi, Ufficiale OMRI (Spanish pronunciation: [ˈmauɾo kamoɾaˈnesi], Italian pronunciation: [ˈmauro kamoraˈnezi]; born 4 October 1976 in Tandil, Argentina) is an Italian Argentine footballer who plays for Racing Club in the Argentine Primera División. He is a midfielder, usually on the right wing. Camoranesi was part of Italy's winning squad at the 2006 World Cup.
comment: Mauro Germán Camoranesi, Ufficiale OMRI (Spanish pronunciation: [ˈmauɾo kamoɾaˈnesi], Italian pronunciation: [ˈmauro kamoraˈnezi]; born 4 October 1976 in Tandil, Argentina) is an Italian Argentine footballer who plays for Racing Club in the Argentine Primera División. He is a midfielder, usually on the right wing. Camoranesi was part of Italy's winning squad at the 2006 World Cup.
